title: Walking Tour in the Barranco Lima
description: Discover Barranco, Lima's bohemian district, on a 2-hour walking tour. Explore iconic landmarks, dive into the local art scene, and learn about the history of Barranco, Lima, and Peru. Get insider dining recommendations and experience the creative energy of this captivating neighborhood.
all_descriptions: Discover Barranco, Lima's bohemian district, on a 2-hour walking tour. Explore iconic landmarks, dive into the local art scene, and learn about the history of Barranco, Lima, and Peru. Get insider dining recommendations and experience the creative energy of this captivating neighborhood.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Barranco, Lima PeruExperience the vibrant and artistic soul of Barranco, Lima's bohemian district, on a captivating walking tour that will transport you through the heart of creativity. Begin your adventure outside the iconic Starbucks of Barranco at 10:30 hrs, where you'll meet your expert tour guide, a passionate storyteller eager to share the secrets of this enchanting neighborhood.

As you wander through the picturesque streets, you'll encounter the Bridge of Sights, a magnificent landmark offering breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean. Explore La Bajada de Baños, a charming path leading you to the coastal cliffs, where the crashing waves provide an awe-inspiring backdrop to the artistic atmosphere.

Uncover the rich art scene of Barranco as you visit eclectic galleries, showcasing the works of renowned local artists. Your guide will immerse you in the history of Barranco, Lima, and Peru, unveiling fascinating stories that have shaped the district's unique character.Duration: 2 hours
Starbucks Pedro de Osma, Av. Pedro de Osma 102, Barranco 15063, PeruMeet your guide at Starbucks, Barranco.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider:

Barranco Walking Tour

After walking 2km to the meeting point the guide never showed up and we were left with walking around and exploring Barranco on our own. Oh well, at least this forced us out of Miraflores for the afternoon.

Must do if you love murals!

Apr 2025 • Couples
If you love murals this is a must do tour!

Our tour guide Rubi speaks fluent English and has a great sense of humor! She provided insightful information and fun facts about the murals and sites we visited. She shared great food recommendations and encouraged us to discover the surrounding areas.
Written April 20, 2025

What your?

Tour cancelled 19 minutes prior to start time after we had Ubered from across Lima to meeting point. Don’t know how we can be expected to rate it beyond one star and ridiculous you are asking us to rate it at all. Very disappointing and a huge inconvenience and waste of our limited time during first time visit to Lima.

100% recommended

May 2024 • Family

Great tour

Mar 2024 • Friends
Outstanding walking tour. Great guide. He guided us around the neighborhood with lots of commentary on the area, culture, restaurant recommendations, etc. Great views of the Pacific from areas we'd never find on our own. Most highly recommended if you've already seen downtown Lima
Written March 25, 2024

Excellent Tour - Beautiful Artwork

Oct 2023 • Family
This was a wonderful tour and Alejandro was charismatic and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend. We had a great time. A lot of opportunities to take photos of gorgeous street art and learn about Barranco.
Written October 11, 2023

y1927
Haifa, Israel2 contributions

The guide didn’t show up. Take a different agency

Although we booked the walking tour a day ahead and our booking was confirmed by the agency Email, the guide did not show up and no one bothered to update if the tour was cancelled. We called the number provided in the booking confirmation but no answer. Two other people who we’re waiting with us tried as well. No response… This has cost us a full morning out of the two days we had in Lima. This is a shame and not acceptable. If you value your time go elsewhere!
Written September 4, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
